text: The worst Blaze ever! Employees very slow and not friendly. My advice, just don’t go there, find other blaze which closer and nicer than this one.

text: Good place for parking and outdoor dining. Friendly staff. Quality of service and food is extraordinary.  Definitely suggest this place to other. I encourage to signup in app to get deals on Pizzas occasionally.

text: Friendly Staff. Customize as per your taste amd crust level. Never hesitate to put more whennyoubasknfor.

name: Jayasimha Nuggehalli
text: I like the concept of build your own pizza. Specially when you get unlimited toppings, sauces and cheese choices. When I visited during weekend, place was very busy and there was a line to order pizza. Service was reasonably quick considering the crowd. Pizza was very tasty as well. Highly recommend this place.

name: Rohit Jain
text: Really tasty pizza. There's something about a pizza made with fresh ingredients that a regular pizza doesn't match. That being said, this place is very crowded at peak times. I have been in queue for up to 40 minutes before getting to place my order. Just keep that in mind, but the pizza itself is amazing!

name: Jubin Edachery
text: It's like Chipotle for pizza. Made to order, pick the crust, sauce and toppings. Made in front of you. What really sets it apart is the amazing freshness and taste of the pizza. It doesn't feel like a heavy processed pizza, but light, fresh and tasty.

name: Choy L Tang
text: Long line during the weekend and weekday lunch hour, however the line moves fast, so it's not too bad the wait. Love the creative pizza and its thin crust, the size is just right for a person, so you don't have a lot to waste or left over. …More
